casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Frank Thomas BENNETT 252P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 2, 2019 Frank Thomas Bennett, for Bennett, Frank Thomas. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of June 2019 by Defendant for Arrest of Judgment:

*213"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of July 2019."
